Name: Lancer
Details: EXPERTISE: Gunnery A crack shot able to use Breaching Shot against even well-defended targets. Adept at the use of ranged weaponry in combat and able to tackle multiple opponents at once via Multi-Target. SPECIALIZATION: Guts Capable of standing their ground more effectively through Bulwark and able to suffer additional injuries before being incapacitated. Can also better control recoil effects from weapons.
